bio: A crony of Mckraken. It was promised even more cuteness in Mckraken’s political rallies.

soultimate.name: Heartmelt Love
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Heals allies at a rate of 15% every 2 seconds for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: All nearby allies slowly recover HP.

skill.effect: Techniques take 30% less time to charge.
skill.name: Charge Ahead

name: W. Pinkipoo
